nodeMetric.field_description: Ad Set Clicks is the total number of times users clicked on a digital advertisement within an ad set. An ad set is a grouping of ads organized by theme.

body.summary: Ad Set Clicks is the total number of times users clicked on a digital advertisement within an ad set. An ad set is a grouping of ads organized by theme.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Ad Set Impressions is the total number of times digital advertisements within an ad set are shown. An ad set is a grouping of ads organized by theme.
Ad Clicks, or simply Clicks, is a marketing metric that counts the number of times users have clicked on a digital advertisement to reach an online property.
Ad Spend is the amount of money spent on specific ad variations within a specific campaign or ad set.
